structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.text: The board shall prepare information of public interest describing the functions of the board that shall include procedures by which grievances are filed and resolved. The board shall make the information available on request to the public and appropriate state agencies.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 5, effective July 13, 2004.
